<template>
  <v-snackbar
    v-model="$store.state.snackbar.show"
    color="black"
    width="100%"
  >
    {{ $store.state.snackbar.text }}

    <template v-slot:action="{ attrs }">
      <v-btn
        @click="$store.commit('hideSnackbar')"
        text
        v-bind="attrs"
        color="#E57373"
      >
      <v-icon
"
      >
      mdi-account-circle
      </v-icon> 
        Fermer
      </v-btn>
    </template>
  </v-snackbar>
</template>

export default {
